pages.title: Morbus Spreading
pages.text: The $(l:morbus_category/host_biome)Host Biome $()is home to thousands of Morbus Mushrooms, and, due to their parasitic nature, will slowly spread to surrounding biomes.$(br2)To check how many days are left before the spreading, you must craft a $(l)Morbus Clock$():

pages.title: Morbus Clock
pages.text: With it, you can check if Morbus Spreading will happen on your world and if so, how many days until it'll happen.$(br)But enough predicting, let's talk about how to prevent the Morbus Spreading.

pages.title: Purifying the Morbus
pages.text: $(2)$(l)Sanctificare Glyph $(br2)$()$(a)Converts a small patch of Morbus into regular grass, cleaning small areas temporarily.

pages.title: Heart of Vivifica
pages.text: Cures the soil from the Morbus spreading permanently, however, it won't remove the already existing damage (use the Sanctificare Glyph for that!)

pages.title: Embracing the Morbus
pages.text: $(8)$(l)Maledictio Glyph $(br2)$()$(7)Opposite to the Sanctificare Glyph, this glyph corrupts a small patch of regular grass into Morbus Grass.

pages.title: Heart of Morbus
pages.text: Reverts the effects of the Heart of Vivifica, allowing the Morbus to spread once again.$(br2)$(4)$(l)WARNING: Both Morbus corrupting items might be disabled on your modpack.
